 12228                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12229                                  
 12230                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12231                                  ;
 12232                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12233                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12234                                  ; are permissible.
 12235                                  ;
 12236                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12237                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12238                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12239                                  ;
 12240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12241                                  
 12242                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 12243 00000F6C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12244                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 12245 00000F6F 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 12246 00000F71 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12247 00000F73 C3                      		retn
 12248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12249                                  
 12250                                  OneK:					
 12251 00000F74 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12252 00000F76 C3                      		retn
 12253                                  
 12254                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12255                                  
 12256                                  
 12257                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 12258 00000F77 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12259 00000F79 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12260 00000F7C D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl

 12267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12268                                  ;
 12269                                  ; SetDASD
 12270                                  ;
 12271                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12272                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12273                                  ;
 12274                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12275                                  ;
 12276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12277                                  
 12278                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12279                                  SetDasd:	
 12280 00000F7F 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12281                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12282 00000F84 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12283                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12284 00000F86 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12285                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12286                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12287 00000F8B 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12288                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12289 00000F8D 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12290                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12291                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12292                                  DoSetDasd:				
 12293 00000F92 C606[3906]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12294 00000F97 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12295 00000F9C B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12296 00000F9E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12297                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12298 00000FA3 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 12299 00000FA5 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12300                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12301 00000FAA 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 12302 00000FAC B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12303 00000FAE EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet
 12304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12305                                  
 12306                                  GotBig:					
 12307 00000FB0 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12308 00000FB2 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12309 00000FB7 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12310                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12311                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12312                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12313                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12314 00000FB9 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12315 00000FBA C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12316                                  DoSet:					
 12317 00000FBF 1E                      		push	ds
 12318 00000FC0 56                      		push	si
 12319 00000FC1 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12320                                  
 12321 00000FC5 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12322                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12323                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 12324                                  
 12325 00000FC9 C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12326                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12327 00000FCD 5E                      		pop	si
 12328 00000FCE 1F                      		pop	ds
 12329 00000FCF B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12330 00000FD1 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12331 00000FD5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12332                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12333                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 12334 00000FD7 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12335 00000FDB 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12336 00000FDF C3                      		retn
 12337                                  
 12338                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12339                                  
 12340                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12341                                  
 12342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12343                                  ;
 12344                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12345                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12346                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12347                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12348                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12349                                  ;
 12350                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12351                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12352                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12353                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12354                                  ;
 12355                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12356                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12357                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12358                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12359                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12360                                  ;
 12361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12362                                  
 12363                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12364                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12365 00000FE0 51                      		push	cx
 12366 00000FE1 52                      		push	dx
 12367                                  
 12368                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12369                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12370                                  
 12371 00000FE2 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12372 00000FE7 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12373 00000FE9 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12374 00000FEB 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12375 00000FF0 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12376 00000FF2 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12378

 12411                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track

 12484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12485                                  ;
 12486                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12487                                  ;
 12488                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12489                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12490                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12491                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12492                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12493                                  ;
 12494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12496                                  ResetDisk:

 12499                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12500 0000107C 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12501                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12502 0000107E C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12503                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12504 00001083 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12505 00001085 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12506                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12507 00001087 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12508                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12509 0000108C 58                      		pop	ax
 12510 0000108D C3                      		retn

 12514                                  ; 16/10/2022

 12516                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12517                                  ;
 12518                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12519                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12520                                  ;
 12521                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12522                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12523                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12524                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12525                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12526                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12527                                  ;
 12528                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12529                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12530                                  ;
 12531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12533                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12534                                  ToRom:

 12581 000010E4 5B                      		pop	bx

 12586                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12587                                  
 12588                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12589                                  
 12590                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12591                                  ;
 12592                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12593                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12594                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12595                                  ;
 12596                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12597                                  
 12598                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12599                                  ioctl_getown:
 12600 000010E6 E8E2F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12601 000010E9 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12602                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12603 000010ED C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12604                                  ownloop:				
 12605 000010F1 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12606 000010F5 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12607                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12608 000010F7 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12609                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12610                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12611 000010FC 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12612                                  getnextBDS:				
 12613 000010FE 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12614 00001101 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12616                                  
 12617                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12618                                  ;
 12619                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12620                                  ; in al to al.
 12621                                  ;
 12622                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12623                                  
 12624                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12625                                  ioctl_setown:
 12626 00001103 E8C5F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12627 00001106 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12628                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12629 0000110B E82BF7                  		call	checksingle
 12630 0000110E C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12631                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12632                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12633                                  
 12634                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12635                                  ;
 12636                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12637                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12638                                  ;
 12639                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12640                                  
 12641                                  exitown:				
 12642 00001113 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12643                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12644 00001115 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12645                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12646                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12647 0000111A 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult

 12649                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12650                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12651 00001120 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12652                                  exitnomult:				
 12653 00001122 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12654 00001126 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12655                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12656                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12657                                  		; cf=0
 12658                                  		;clc
 12659 00001129 C3                      		retn

 12716                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12717                                  
 12718                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12719                                  ;	get media id
 12720                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12721                                  ;
 12722                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12723                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12724                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12725                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12726                                  ;
 12727                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12728                                  ;
 12729                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12730                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12731                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12732                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12733                                  ;
 12734                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12735                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12736                                  ;
 12737                                  ; LOGIC:
 12738                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12739                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12740                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12741                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12742                                  ;
 12743                                  ; {
 12744                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12745                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12746                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12747                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12748                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12749                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12750                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12751                                  ;		};
 12752                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12753                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12754                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12755                                  ;		};
 12756                                  ;	else
 12757                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12758                                  ;
 12759                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12760                                  
 12761                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12762                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12763                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12764                                  
 12765                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12766                                  GetMediaId:
 12767 00001152 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12768 00001155 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12769 00001159 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12770 0000115E E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12771 00001161 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12772                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12773 00001163 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12774                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12775 00001168 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12776                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12777 0000116A BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12778 0000116D 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12779                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12780                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12781 00001170 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12782 00001172 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12783 00001176 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12784                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12785 0000117A 46                      		inc	si
 12786                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12787                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12788 0000117B 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12789 0000117E B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12790                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12791                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12792 00001181 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12793                                  	
 12794                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12795                                  		; cf = 0
 12796                                  		;clc
 12797                                  
 12798 00001183 C3                      		retn
 12799                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12800                                  
 12801                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12802 00001184 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12803 00001186 F9                      		stc
 12804                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12805 00001187 C3                      		retn
 12806                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12807                                  
 12808                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12809                                  
 12810                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12811                                  ;  set media id
 12812                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12813                                  
 12814                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12815                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12816                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12817                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12818                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12819                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12820                                  ;
 12821                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12822                                  ;
 12823                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12824                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12825                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12826                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12827                                  ;
 12828                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12829                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12830                                  ;
 12831                                  ; logic:
 12832                                  ;
 12833                                  ; {
 12834                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12835                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12836                                  ;	BootIo;
 12837                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12838                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12839                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12840                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12841                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12842                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12843                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12844                                  ;		};
 12845                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12846                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12847                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12848                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12849                                  ;		};
 12850                                  ;	else
 12851                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12852                                  ;
 12853                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12854                                  
 12855                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12856                                  SetMediaId:
 12857 00001188 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12858 0000118B 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12859                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12860 0000118F 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12861 00001191 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12862 00001196 52                      		push	dx
 12863 00001197 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12864 0000119A 5A                      		pop	dx
 12865 0000119B 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12866                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12867 0000119D 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12868                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12869 000011A2 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12870 000011A4 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12871                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12872 000011A9 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12873 000011AB 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12874 000011AC 57                      		push	di
 12875 000011AD 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12876 000011AE 07                      		pop	es
 12877 000011AF BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12878 000011B2 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12879 000011B6 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12880 000011B9 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12881 000011BC B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12882                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12883                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12884 000011BF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12885 000011C1 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12886 000011C2 1F                      		pop	ds
 12887 000011C3 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12888 000011C4 07                      		pop	es
 12889 000011C5 E86DF5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12890 000011C8 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12891 000011CA C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12892 000011CF E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12893 000011D2 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12894                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12895                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12896 000011D7 C3                      		retn
 12897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12898                                  
 12899                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12900 000011D8 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12901 000011DA F9                      		stc
 12902                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12903 000011DB C3                      		retn
 12904                                  
 12905                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12906                                  
 12907                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12908                                  
 12909                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12910                                  ;	BootIo
 12911                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12912                                  ;
 12913                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12914                                  ;
 12915                                  ; input :
 12916                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12917                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12918                                  ;
 12919                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12920                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12921                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12922                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12923                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12924                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12925                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12926                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12927                                  ;
 12928                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12929                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12930                                  ;
 12931                                  ; logic:
 12932                                  ;
 12933                                  ; {
 12934                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12935                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12936                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12937                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12938                                  ; }
 12939                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12940                                  
 12941                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12942                                  BootIo:	
 12943 000011DC 06                      		push	es
 12944 000011DD 57                      		push	di
 12945 000011DE 53                      		push	bx
 12946 000011DF 1E                      		push	ds
 12947 000011E0 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12948                                  
 12949                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12950                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12951                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12952                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12953                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12954                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12955                                  
 12956 000011E1 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12957 000011E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12958 000011E6 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12959 000011EA B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12960 000011ED E8D7F6                  		call	diskio
 12961 000011F0 5B                      		pop	bx
 12962 000011F1 5F                      		pop	di
 12963 000011F2 07                      		pop	es
 12964 000011F3 C3                      		retn
 12965                                  
 12966                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12967                                  
 12968                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12969                                  
 12970                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12971                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12972                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12973                                  ;
 12974                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12975                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12976                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12977                                  ; history in the flags.
 12978                                  ;
 12979                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12980                                  ;
 12981                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12982                                  ;
 12983                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12984                                  ;
 12985                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12986                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12987                                  ;
 12988                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12989                                  
 12990                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12991 000011F4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12992 000011F8 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12993 000011FA 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12994                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12995 000011FC 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12996                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12997                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12998 00001201 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12999 00001203 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13000 00001208 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13001 0000120A E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13002 0000120D 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13003                                  
 13004                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13005                                  
 13006 0000120F B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13007 00001211 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13008                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13009                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13010 00001213 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13011 00001215 53                      		push	bx
 13012 00001216 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13013                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13014                                  					; physical drive
 13015 00001219 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13016 0000121C 5B                      		pop	bx
 13017                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13018 0000121D C3                      		retn
 13019                                  
 13020                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13021                                  
 13022                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13023                                  
 13024                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13025                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13026                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13027                                  ;
 13028                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13029                                  ;
 13030                                  ; INPUT :
 13031                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13032                                  ;
 13033                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13034                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13035                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13036                                  
 13037                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13038                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13039 0000121E C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13040 00001222 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13041                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13042                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13043 00001225 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13044                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13045 00001227 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13046                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13047                                  					; unformatted_media
 13048 0000122C 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13049 0000122E FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13050                                  
 13051                                  GafDone:				
 13052 00001230 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13053 00001233 C3                      		retn
 13054                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13055                                  
 13056                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13057                                  
 13058                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13059                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13060                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13061                                  ;
 13062                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13063                                  ;
 13064                                  ; input :
 13065                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13066                                  ;
 13067                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13068                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13069                                  
 13070                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13071                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13072 00001234 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13073 00001238 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13074                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13075 0000123B 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13076                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13077                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13078 00001240 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13079 00001244 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13080                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13081 00001246 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13082                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13083                                  					; unformatted_media
 13084                                  saf_Done:				
 13085 0000124B C3                      		retn
 13086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13087                                  
 13088                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13089                                  
 13090                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13091                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13092                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13093                                  ;
 13094                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13095                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13096                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13097                                  ;
 13098                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13099                                  
 13100                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13101                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13102 0000124C 06                      		push	es
 13103 0000124D C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13104 00001251 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13105                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13106 00001255 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13107                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13108 00001257 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13109 00001259 0E                      		push	cs
 13110 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13111 0000125B B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13112                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13113 0000125E BF[350C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13114                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13115                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13116 00001261 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13117 00001263 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13118 00001265 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13119 00001267 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13120                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13121                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13122                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13123                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13124                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13125                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13126                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 13127 0000126A 07                      		pop	es
 13128                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13129                                  		; cf = 0
 13130                                  		;clc
 13131 0000126B C3                      		retn
 13132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13133                                  nosupport:				
 13134 0000126C 07                      		pop	es
 13135 0000126D E965EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13137                                  
 13138                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13139                                  
 13140                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13141                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13142                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13143                                  ;
 13144                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13145                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13146                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13147                                  ;	    drive)
 13148                                  ;
 13149                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13150                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13151                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13152                                  ;
 13153                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13154                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13155                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13156                                  ;
 13157                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13158                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13159                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13160                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13161                                  ;
 13162                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13163                                  ;
 13164                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13165                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13166                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13167                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13168                                  ; 
 13169                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13170                                  
 13171                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13172                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13173 00001270 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13174 00001274 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13175                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13176                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13177 00001277 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13178 00001279 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13179                                  		;
 13180 0000127B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13181                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13182                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13183                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13184 0000127F B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13185                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13186 00001281 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13187 00001283 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13188 00001285 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13189                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13190 00001287 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13191 00001289 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13192 0000128B 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13193 0000128D 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13194 0000128F 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13195 00001291 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13196 00001293 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13197 00001295 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13198                                  GotMediaType:				
 13199 00001297 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13200                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13201                                  		; cf = 0
 13202                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13203 0000129A C3                      		retn
 13204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13205                                  
 13206                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13207 0000129B 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13208 0000129E 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13209 000012A0 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13210 000012A2 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13211 000012A5 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13212                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13213 000012A7 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13214                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13215 000012A9 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13216 000012AB F9                      		stc
 13217 000012AC C3                      		retn
 13218                                  
 13219                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13220                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13221                                  		;db    0
 13222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13223                                  
 13224                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13225                                  
 13226                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13227                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13228                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13229                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13230                                  
 13231                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13232                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13233                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13234                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13235                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13236                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13237                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13238                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13239                                  ;
 13240                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13241                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13242                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13243                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13244                                  ;
 13245                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13246                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13247                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13248                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13249                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13250                                  ;
 13251                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13252                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13253                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13254                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13255                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13256                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13257                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13258                                  
 13259                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13260                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13261                                  
 13262                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13263                                  
 13264                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13265 000012AD 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13266 000012B0 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13267 000012B2 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13268 000012B5 743B                    		jz	short mine
 13269                                  
 13270                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13271                                  
 13272 000012B7 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13273 000012BA 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 13274 000012BC 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13275 000012BF 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13276 000012C1 E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13278                                  
 13279                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13280 000012C4 CF                      		iret
 13281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13282                                  
 13283                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 13284 000012C5 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13285 000012C6 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13286                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13287                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13288                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13289 000012C8 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13290                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13291                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13292                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13293                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13294                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13295 000012CD FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 13296 000012D1 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13297 000012D5 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 13298 000012D9 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13299                                  
 13300                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
