 31041                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31042                                  
 31043                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31044                                  	mov     ax,es
 31045                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31046                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31047                                  	inc     ax
 31048                                  	mov     es,ax
 31049                                  	
 31050                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31051                                  
 31052                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31053                                  	pop	dx
 31054                                  	pop	cx
 31055                                  	pop	ax
 31056                                  	retn
 31057                                  
 31058                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31059                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31060                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31061                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31062                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31063                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31064                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31065                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31066                                  
 31067                                  UmbTest:
 31068                                  	push	ax
 31069                                  	push	bx
 31070                                  	push	ds
 31071                                  	push	es
 31072                                  
 31073                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31074                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31075                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31076                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31077                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31078                                  
 31079                                  	pop	es
 31080                                  	pop	ds
 31081                                  	pop	bx
 31082                                  	pop	ax
 31083                                  	retn
 31084                                  
 31085                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31086                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31087                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31088                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31089                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31090                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31091                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31092                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31093                                  
 31094                                  WalkMem:
 31095                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31096                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31097                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31098                                  		   	
 31099                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31100                                  	int	21h
 31101                                  
 31102                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31103                                  	mov	es,ax
 31104                                  
 31105                                  ; ------------------------------
 31106                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31107                                  ; ------------------------------
 31108                                  
 31109                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31110                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31111                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31112                                  
 31113                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31114                                  
 31115                                  	mov     bx,es
 31116                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31117                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31118                                  	inc     bx
 31119                                  	mov     es,bx
 31120                                  		
 31121                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31122                                  um20:	
 31123                                  	mov	ax,es
 31124                                  
 31125                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31126                                  
 31127                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31128                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31129                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31130                                  	retn
 31131                                  
 31132                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31133                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31134                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31135                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31136                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31137                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31138                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31139                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31140                                  
 31141                                  hl_unlink:
 31142                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31143                                  
 31144                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31145                                  	;
 31146                                  	;push	ds
 31147                                  	;push	cs
 31148                                  	;pop	ds
 31149                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31150                                  	;pop	ds
 31151                                  
 31152                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31153                                  
 31154                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31155                                  	int	21h
 31156                                  	retn
 31157                                  
 31158                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31159                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31160                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31161                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31162                                  
 31163                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31164                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31165                                  
 31166                                  ;   Modification log:
 31167                                  ;
 31168                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31169                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31170                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31171                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31172                                  
 31173                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31174                                  
 31175                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31176                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31177                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31178                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31179                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31180                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31181                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31182                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31183                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31184                                  
 31185                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31186                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31187                                  
 31188                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31189                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31190                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31191                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31192                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31193                                  ;    every command execution.
 31194                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31195                                  
 31196                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31197                                  	;
 31198                                  	;push	ds
 31199                                  	;push	cs
 31200                                  	;pop	ds
 31201                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31202                                  	;pop	ds	
 31203                                  
 31204                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31205                                  
 31206                                  	or	al,al
 31207                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31208                                  
 31209                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31210                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31211                                  	retn			; that.
 31212                                  uhu10:	
 31213                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31214                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31215                                  
 31216                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31217                                  	;
 31218                                  	;push	es
 31219                                  	;push	cs
 31220                                  	;pop	es
 31221                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31222                                  	;pop	ds	
 31223                                  
 31224                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31225                                  
 31226                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31227                                  
 31228                                  	pop	ax
 31229                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31230                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31231                                  	retn
 31232                                  
 31233                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31234                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31235                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31236                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31237                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31238                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31239                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31240                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31241                                  
 31242                                  he_unlink:
 31243                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31244                                  
 31245                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31246                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31247                                  
 31248                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31249                                  	int	21h
 31250                                  	retn
 31251                                  
 31252                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31253                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31254                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31255                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31256                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31257                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31258                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31259                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31260                                  
 31261                                  FreeUMBs:
 31262                                  	push	ax
 31263                                  	push	es
 31264                                  
 31265                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31266                                  	jc	short fusX
 31267                                  
 31268                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31269                                  fus10:	
 31270                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31271                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31272                                  	call	freeMCB
 31273                                  fus20:	   
 31274                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31275                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31276                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31277                                  
 31278                                  	mov	ax,es
 31279                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31280                                  	inc	ax
 31281                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31282                                  
 31283                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31284                                  fusX:	
 31285                                  	pop	es
 31286                                  	pop	ax
 31287                                  	retn
 31288                                  
 31289                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31290                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31292                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31293                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31294                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31295                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31296                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31297                                  
 31298                                  isHideMCB:
 31299                                  	;push	ax
 31300                                  
 31301                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31302                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31303                                  
 31304                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31305                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31306                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31307                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31308                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31309                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31310                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31311                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31312                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31313                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31314                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31315                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31316                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31317                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31318                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31319                                  ihm_x:	
 31320                                  	;pop	ax
 31321                                  	retn
 31322                                  
 31323                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31324                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31325                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31326                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31327                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31328                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31329                                  ; USES:     AX
 31330                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31331                                  
 31332                                  freeMCB:
 31333                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31334                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31335                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31336                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31337                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31338                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31339                                  	retn
 31340                                  
 31341                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31342                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31343                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31344                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31345                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31346                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31347                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31348                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31349                                  
 31350                                  HeadUmb:
 31351                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31352                                  
 31353                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31354                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31355                                  	;push	es
 31356                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31357                                  
 31358                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31359                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31360                                  
 31361                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31362                                  	int	21h
 31363                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31364                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31365                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31366                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31367                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31368                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31369                                  
 31370                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31371                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31372                                  xhu_e:	
 31373                                  	;stc
 31374                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31375                                  xhu_x:	
 31376                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31377                                  	;pop	es	
 31378                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31379                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31380                                  	retn
 31381                                  
 31382                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31383                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31384                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31385                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31386                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31387                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31388                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31389                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31390                                  
 31391                                  linkumb:
 31392                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31393                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31394                                  
 31395                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31396                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31397                                  
 31398                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31399                                  	mov	bx,1
 31400                                  	int	21h
 31401                                  lumbX:
 31402                                  	retn
 31403                                  
 31404                                  %endif
 31405                                  
 31406                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31407                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31408                                  
 31409                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31410                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31411                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31412                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31413                                  
 31414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31415                                  ;
 31416                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31417                                  ;
 31418                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31419                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31420                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31421                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31422                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31423                                  ;
 31424                                  ;	Output : none
 31425                                  ;
 31426                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31427                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31428                                  ;
 31429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31430                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31431                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31432                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31433                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31434                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31435                                  
 31436                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31437                                  InitDevLoad:
 31438                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31439                                  	; ds = cs
 31440 00002802 803E[F11E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31441                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31442                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31443 00002807 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31444                                  
 31445                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31446                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31447                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31448                                  ;
 31449                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31450                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31451                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31452                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31453                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31454                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31455                                  ;
 31456                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31457                                  ;
 31458                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31459                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31460                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31461                                  ;	pushf
 31462                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31463                                  ;	popf
 31464                                  ;
 31465                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31466                                  ;
 31467                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31468                                  
 31469                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31470                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31471                                  InitForConv:
 31472                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31473                                  	; ds = cs
 31474 00002809 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31475                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31476 0000280C 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31477 0000280E E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31478 00002811 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31479 00002814 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31480                                  					;  in low memory
 31481                                  InitForHi:
 31482                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31483                                  	; ds = cs
 31484                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31485                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31486                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31487 00002816 A1[E71E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31488 00002819 8B16[E31E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31489 0000281D 0316[E51E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31490 00002821 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31491                                  
 31492                                  InitForLo:
 31493                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31494                                  	; ds = cs
 31495                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31496 00002823 C606[F11E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31497                                  initforlo_x:
 31498                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31499                                  	; ds = cs
 31500                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31501                                  					;  we are loading low
 31502                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31503                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31504 00002828 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31505 0000282B 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31506                                  idl1:
 31507 0000282F E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31508                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31509                                  	; ds = cs
 31510                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31511                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31512                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31513                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31514 00002832 A3[D61E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31515 00002835 8916[D81E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31516 00002839 C706[DA1E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31517 0000283F A3[DC1E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31518 00002842 C3                      	retn
 31519                                  
 31520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31521                                  ;
 31522                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31523                                  ;
 31524                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31525                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31526                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31527                                  ;		   current UMB
 31528                                  ;
 31529                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31530                                  
 31531                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31532                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31533                                  	; ds = cs
 31534                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31535                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31536                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31537 00002843 A1[E51E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31538 00002846 0306[E31E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31539 0000284A 2B06[E71E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31540                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31541                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31542                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31543                                  	;stc
 31544                                  	;retn
 31545                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31546 0000284E 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31547 00002851 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31548                                  spcinumb1:
 31549 00002853 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31550                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31551                                  	; ds = cs
 31552 00002854 3B06[D41E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31553                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31554                                  spcinumb2:
 31555 00002858 C3                      	retn
 31556                                  
 31557                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31558                                  ;
 31559                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31560                                  ;
 31561                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31562                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31563                                  ;
 31564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31565                                  
 31566                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31567                                  ;
 31568                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31569                                  ;	push	ds
 31570                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31571                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31572                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31573                                  ;	pop	ds
 31574                                  ;
 31575                                  ;	inc	ax
 31576                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31577                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31578                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31579                                  ;	retn
 31580                                  
 31581                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31582                                  ;
 31583                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31584                                  ;
 31585                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31586                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31587                                  ;		 the device.
 31588                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31589                                  ;
 31590                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31591                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31592                                  ;	UMB.
 31593                                  ;
 31594                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31595                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31596                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31597                                  ;
 31598                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31599                                  
 31600                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31601                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31602                                  
 31603                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31604                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31605                                  	; ds = cs
 31606 00002859 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31607 0000285C B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31608 0000285F CD21                    	int	21h
 31609                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31610                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31611                                  
 31612 00002861 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31613 00002863 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31614                                  
 31615 00002865 4B                      	dec	bx
 31616                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31617                                  	; ds = cs
 31618 00002866 391E[D41E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31619                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31620 0000286A 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31621 0000286C 43                      	inc	bx
 31622                                  
 31623 0000286D B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h

 31665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31666                                  ;
 31667                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31668                                  ;
 31669                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31670                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31671                                  ;
 31672                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31673                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31674                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31675                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31676                                  ;
 31677                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31678                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31679                                  ;
 31680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31681                                  
 31682                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31683                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31684                                  
 31685                                  DevSetMark:

 31687 0000289F 57                      	push	di
 31688 000028A0 1E                      	push	ds
 31689 000028A1 56                      	push	si

 31691 000028A4 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31692 000028AA 40                      	inc	ax
 31693 000028AB 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31694                                  
 31695                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31696                                  
 31697 000028AF 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31698 000028B0 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31699                                  
 31700 000028B5 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31701 000028B7 FC                      	cld
 31702                                  dsm_again:
 31703 000028B8 AC                      	lodsb
 31704 000028B9 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31705 000028BB 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31706 000028BD 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31707 000028BF EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31708                                  isit_slash:
 31709 000028C1 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31710 000028C3 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31711 000028C5 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31712 000028C7 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31713                                  isit_null:
 31714 000028C9 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31715 000028CB 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31716 000028CD 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31717                                  
 31718 000028CF BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31719 000028D2 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31720                                  dsm_next_char:
 31721 000028D5 AC                      	lodsb
 31722 000028D6 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31723 000028D8 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31724 000028DA 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31725 000028DC 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31726 000028DE AA                      	stosb
 31727 000028DF E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31728                                  blankout:

 31732                                  dsm_exit:

 31736 000028EA 5F                      	pop	di
 31737 000028EB 07                      	pop	es
 31738 000028EC C3                      	retn

 31747                                  ;
 31748                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31749                                  ;	in DevSize
 31750                                  ;
 31751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31752                                  
 31753                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 31755                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 31769 00002902 CD21                    	int	21h

 31771 00002906 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31772 00002909 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31773 0000290C F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31774 00002910 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no

 31776                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31777 00002919 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31778                                  szdev1:
 31779 0000291B B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31780 0000291D D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31781 0000291F B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31782 00002921 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31783 00002923 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31784                                  	;
 31785                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31786 00002925 2E3B06[F21E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]

 32121                                  ;
 32122                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32123                                  ;
 32124                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32125                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32126                                  ;
 32127                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32128                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32129                                  ;
 32130                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32131                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32132                                  ;
 32133                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32134                                  
 32135                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32136                                  
 32137                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32138                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32139                                  GetHexNum:
 32140 00002A21 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32141 00002A23 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32142                                  ghn_next:
 32143 00002A25 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32144 00002A28 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh

 32192                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32193                                  ;
 32194                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32195                                  ;
 32196                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32197                                  ;
 32198                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32199                                  ;
 32200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32204                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32205                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32206 00002A68 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32207 00002A6A 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32208 00002A6D 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32209 00002A6F 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32210 00002A72 C3                      	retn
 32211                                  is_it_hex:
 32212 00002A73 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32213                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32214                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32215 00002A76 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32216 00002A78 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32217 00002A7B 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32218 00002A7D 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc

 32309                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32310                                  ;
 32311                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32312                                  ;
 32313                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32314                                  ;
 32315                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32316                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32317                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32318                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32319                                  ;				NC
 32320                                  ;			  else 
 32321                                  ;				CY
 32322                                  ;
 32323                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32324                                  ;
 32325                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32326                                  
 32327                                  umb_allocate:
 32328                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32329                                  	; ds = cs
 32330 00002AC2 50                      	push	ax
 32331 00002AC3 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32332 00002AC5 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32333                                  					;   possible
 32334                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32335 00002AC8 FF1E[E91E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32336                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32337                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32338                                  					; the largest UMB
 32339 00002ACC 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32340 00002ACE 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32341                                  	
 32342 00002AD0 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32343                                  
 32344                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32345 00002AD2 FF1E[E91E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32346                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32347                                  
 32348 00002AD6 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32349 00002AD9 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32350                                  	;clc
 32351                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32352                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32353                                  	; cf=0
 32354                                  	;clc 
 32355                                  ua_done:
 32356 00002ADB 58                      	pop	ax
 32357 00002ADC C3                      	retn
 32358                                  ua_err:
 32359 00002ADD F9                      	stc
 32360 00002ADE EBFB                    	jmp	short ua_done
 32361                                  
 32362                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32363                                  ;
 32364                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32365                                  ;
 32366                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32367                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32368                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32369                                  ;			; DS = data
 32370                                  ;
 32371                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32372                                  ;
 32373                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32374                                  ;
 32375                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32376                                  
 32377                                  umb_insert:
 32378 00002AE0 1E                      	push	ds
 32379                                  
 32380                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32381                                  	; ds = cs
 32382                                  
 32383                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32384 00002AE1 8E1E[001F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32385                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32386 00002AE5 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32387 00002AE9 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32388 00002AEB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32389                                  ui_next:
 32390 00002AED 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32391                                  					;    new block
 32392 00002AEF 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32393                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32394                                  					;    last
 32395 00002AF1 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32396 00002AF7 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32397                                  					; N: get next block
 32398 00002AF9 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32399                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32400 00002AFB E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32401 00002AFE EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32402                                  
 32403                                  ui_insert:
 32404 00002B00 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32405 00002B02 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32406                                  
 32407 00002B03 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32408 00002B05 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32409                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32410 00002B07 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32411                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32412 00002B0C C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32413                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32414 00002B12 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32415                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32416 00002B16 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32417                                  
 32418                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32419                                  
 32420 00002B1C 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32421 00002B1E 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32422 00002B24 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32423                                  					; mark as free
 32424 00002B2B 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32425                                  					; start & end of new block
 32426 00002B2E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32427                                  
 32428                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32429                                  	
 32430 00002B33 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32431 00002B35 43                      	inc	bx
 32432 00002B36 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32433 00002B38 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32434                                  
 32435                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32436                                  					; this block
 32437 00002B39 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32438                                  	
 32439 00002B3B 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32440 00002B41 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32441 00002B48 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32442 00002B4C 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32443                                  
 32444 00002B53 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32445                                  
 32446                                  ui_append:
 32447                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32448 00002B55 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32449 00002B5A 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32450                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32451                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32452                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32453 00002B60 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32454                                  
 32455 00002B66 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32456 00002B68 40                      	inc	ax
 32457 00002B69 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32458                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32459 00002B6B F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32460                                  
 32461 00002B6D 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32462                                  
 32463 00002B6F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32464 00002B75 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32465 00002B7C 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32466 00002B80 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32467                                  
 32468                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32469 00002B87 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32470 00002B89 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32471 00002B8F 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32472                                  					; mark as free
 32473 00002B96 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32474 00002B97 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32475                                  ui_done:
 32476                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32477 00002B9C 1F                      	pop	ds
 32478                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32479                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32480 00002B9D C3                      	retn
 32481                                  
 32482                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32483                                  
 32484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32485                                  ;
 32486                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32487                                  ;
 32488                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32489                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32490                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32491                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32492                                  ;
 32493                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32494                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32495                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32496                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32497                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32498                                  ;
 32499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32500                                  
 32501                                  umb_coalesce:
 32502                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32503                                  	; ds = cs
 32504 00002B9E 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32505                                  
 32506 00002B9F 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32507                                  
 32508                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32509                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32510 00002BA1 8E06[001F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32511 00002BA5 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32512                                  uc_nextfree:
 32513 00002BAA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32514 00002BAC 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32515                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32516 00002BAE 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32517 00002BB3 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32518                                  					; N: get next arena
 32519 00002BB5 E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32520 00002BB8 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32521 00002BBA EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32522                                  uc_again:
 32523 00002BBC E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32524 00002BBF 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32525                                  uc_check:
 32526 00002BC1 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32527 00002BC6 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32528                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32529 00002BC8 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32530 00002BCD 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32531                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32532 00002BCE 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32533 00002BD2 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32534 00002BD5 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32535 00002BD7 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32536                                  
 32537                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32538                                  ;uc_done:
 32539                                  	;retn
 32540                                  
 32541                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32542                                  ;
 32543                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32544                                  ;
 32545                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32546                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32547                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32548                                  ;
 32549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32550                                  
 32551                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32552                                  get_next:
 32553 00002BD9 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32554 00002BDE 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32555                                  _get_next_:
 32556 00002BE0 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32557 00002BE2 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32558 00002BE6 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32559 00002BE7 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32560                                  	;clc
 32561                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32562                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32563                                  	; cf=0
 32564                                  	;clc
 32565 00002BE9 C3                      	retn
 32566                                  gn_err:
 32567 00002BEA F9                      	stc
 32568                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32569                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32570 00002BEB C3                      	retn
 32571                                  
 32572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32573                                  ;
 32574                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32575                                  ;
 32576                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32577                                  
 32578                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32579                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32580                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32581                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32582                                  	; ds = cs
 32583 00002BEC E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32584 00002BEF 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32585                                  
 32586                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32587                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32588                                  
 32589                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32590                                  	; ds = cs
 32591                                  
 32592 00002BF1 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32593 00002BF3 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32594 00002BF5 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32595                                  
 32596 00002BF7 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32597 00002BF9 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32598                                  
 32599 00002BFB F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32600                                  
 32601 00002BFD 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32602 00002C00 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32603                                  	
 32604 00002C02 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32605 00002C08 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32606                                  					
 32607 00002C0F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32608 00002C13 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32609                                  
 32610                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32611                                  
 32612 00002C1A 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32613 00002C1C 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32614 00002C22 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32615                                  					; mark as free 
 32616 00002C29 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32617 00002C2A 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32618                                  
 32619                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32620                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32621 00002C2F 8E06[001F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32622 00002C33 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32623 00002C36 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32624                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32625                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32626                                  
 32627                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32628                                  
 32629 00002C39 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32630 00002C3C 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32631 00002C3F 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32632                                  ;scan_next
 32633                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32634                                  scannext:
 32635 00002C41 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32636 00002C45 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32637                                  	
 32638 00002C47 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32639 00002C49 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32640 00002C4E 40                      	inc	ax
 32641 00002C4F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32642                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32643                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32644 00002C51 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32645                                  got_last:
 32646 00002C53 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32647 00002C59 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32648                                  	;clc
 32649                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32650                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32651                                  	; cf=0
 32652                                  	;clc
 32653 00002C5F C3                      	retn
 32654                                  
 32655                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32656                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32657                                  ;	;stc
 32658                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32659                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32660                                  ;	; cf=1
 32661                                  ;	;stc
 32662                                  ;	retn

 32666                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32667                                  ;
 32668                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32669                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32670                                  ;
 32671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32672                                  
 32673                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32674                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32675                                  	; ds = cs
 32676 00002C60 833E[E31E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32677                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32678 00002C65 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32679 00002C67 06                      	push	es
 32680 00002C68 53                      	push	bx
 32681                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32682                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32683                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32684                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32685 00002C69 8B1E[E71E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32686 00002C6D 2B1E[E31E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32687 00002C71 8E06[E31E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32688                                  	
 32689 00002C75 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32690 00002C78 CD21                    	int	21h
 32691                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32692                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32693                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32694 00002C7A 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32695 00002C7C 48                      	dec	ax
 32696 00002C7D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32697 00002C7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32698 00002C86 5B                      	pop	bx
 32699 00002C87 07                      	pop	es
 32700                                  su_exit:
 32701 00002C88 C3                      	retn

 32722                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32723 00002C96 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32724 00002C9B 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32725                                  ulu_next:
 32726 00002CA0 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32727 00002CA3 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32728 00002CA5 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32729 00002CA7 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32730 00002CA9 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32731 00002CAB EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32732                                  ulu_found:

 32734 00002CAD C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
