 34460                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34461                                  
 34462                                  menu_autoselect:
 34463                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34464                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34465                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34466                                  menu_abort:
 34467                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34468                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34469                                  
 34470                                  normal_boot:
 34471                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34472                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34473                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34474                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34475                                          jmp     menu_search
 34476                                  
 34477                                  not_topmenu:
 34478                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34479                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34480                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34481                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34482                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34483                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34484                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34485                                          jmp     menu_found
 34486                                  
 34487                                  not_submenu:
 34488                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34489                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34490                                  
 34491                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34492                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34493                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34494                                  
 34495                                  no_selection:
 34496                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34497                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34498                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34499                                          push    ds              ;
 34500                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34501                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34502                                  
 34503                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34504                                  ;
 34505                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34506                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34507                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34508                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34509                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34510                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34511                                  ;
 34512                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34513                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34514                                  
 34515                                  copyblock_loop:
 34516                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34517                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34518                                          pop     bx              ;
 34519                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34520                                  
 34521                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34522                                  
 34523                                  copyblock_begin:
 34524                                          push    ax              ;
 34525                                          push    cx              ;
 34526                                          push    si              ;
 34527                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34528                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34529                                          push    ds              ;
 34530                                          push    cs              ;
 34531                                          pop     ds              ;
 34532                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34533                                          pop     ds              ;
 34534                                          pop     di              ;
 34535                                          pop     si              ;
 34536                                          pop     cx              ;
 34537                                          pop     ax              ;
 34538                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34539                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34540                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34541                                          push    di              ;
 34542                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34543                                          push    ds              ;
 34544                                          push    es              ;
 34545                                          pop     ds              ;
 34546                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34547                                          pop     ds              ;
 34548                                          pop     di              ;
 34549                                  copyblock_check:
 34550                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34551                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34552                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34553                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34554                                  
 34555                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34556                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34557                                          call    get_char        ;
 34558                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34559                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34560                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34561                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34562                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34563                                  ;
 34564                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34565                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34566                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34567                                  ;
 34568                                  move_config:
 34569                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34570                                          push    cx              ;
 34571                                  ;
 34572                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34573                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34574                                  ;
 34575                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34576                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34577                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34578                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34579                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34580                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34581                                  copy_boot: 
 34582                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34583                                          cs
 34584                                  	lodsb
 34585                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34586                                          inc     di              ;
 34587                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34588                                  
 34589                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34590                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34591                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34592                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34593                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34594                                          push    cs              ;
 34595                                          pop     es              ;
 34596                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34597                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34598                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34599                                          je	short l2	;
 34600                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34601                                          inc     si              ;
 34602                                          inc     di              ;
 34603                                          loop    l1              ;
 34604                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34605                                          pop     es              ;
 34606                                  
 34607                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34608                                  
 34609                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34610                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34611                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34612                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34613                                  
 34614                                          push    cx              ;
 34615                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34616                                          pop     cx              ;
 34617                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34618                                          pop     ds              ;
 34619                                  
 34620                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34621                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34622                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34623                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34624                                  ;   is empty.
 34625                                  
 34626                                          push    es              ;
 34627                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34628                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34629                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34630                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34631                                          pop     es
 34632                                  
 34633                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34634                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34635                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34636                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34637                                  
 34638                                  menu_done:
 34639                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34640                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34641                                          push    es              ;
 34642                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34643                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34644                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34645                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34646                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34647                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34648                                          pop     es              ;
 34649                                  menu_exit:
 34650                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34651                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34652                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34653                                          retn
 34654                                  
 34655                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34656                                  ;
 34657                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34658                                  ;
 34659                                  ;   INPUT
 34660                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34661                                  ;
 34662                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34663                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34664                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34665                                  ;
 34666                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34667                                  ;       None
 34668                                  ;
 34669                                  ;   NOTES
 34670                                  ;       None
 34671                                  ;
 34672                                  ;   HISTORY
 34673                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34674                                  ;
 34675                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34676                                  
 34677                                  copy_envvar:
 34678                                          push    cx              ;
 34679                                          push    si              ;
 34680                                          push    ds              ;
 34681                                          push    es              ;
 34682                                          push    es              ;
 34683                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34684                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34685                                  
 34686                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34687                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34688                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34689                                  ;
 34690                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34691                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34692                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34693                                  
 34694                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34695                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34696                                          lodsb                   ;
 34697                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34698                                          stc                     ;
 34699                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34700                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34701                                          stc                     ;
 34702                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34703                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34704                                          stc                     ;
 34705                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34706                                          inc     cx              ;
 34707                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34708                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34709                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34710                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34711                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34712                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34713                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34714                                  copy_varsrch:
 34715                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34716                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34717                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34718                                          push    cx              ;
 34719                                          push    si              ;
 34720                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34721                                          pop     si              ;
 34722                                          pop     cx              ;
 34723                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34724                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34725                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34726                                  
 34727                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34728                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34729                                  
 34730                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34731                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34732                                          push    si              ;
 34733                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34734                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34735                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34736                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34737                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34738                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34739                                  
 34740                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34741                                  	es	; 26h
 34742                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34743                                  
 34744                                  	pop     si
 34745                                  copy_envprep:
 34746                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34747                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34748                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34749                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34750                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34751                                  
 34752                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34753                                          push    cx              ;
 34754                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34755                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34756                                          pop     cx              ;
 34757                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34758                                  
 34759                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34760                                          lodsb                   ;
 34761                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34762                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34763                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34764                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34765                                          stosb                   ;
 34766                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34767                                  
 34768                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34769                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34770                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34771                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34772                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34773                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34774                                  
 34775                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34776                                          pop     es              ;
 34777                                          pop     ds              ;
 34778                                          pop     si              ;
 34779                                          pop     cx              ;
 34780                                  
 34781                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34782                                          retn
 34783                                  
 34784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34785                                  ;
 34786                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34787                                  ;
 34788                                  ;   INPUT
 34789                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34790                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34791                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34792                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34793                                  ;
 34794                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34795                                  ;       Same as above
 34796                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34797                                  ;
 34798                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34799                                  ;       All
 34800                                  ;
 34801                                  ;   NOTES
 34802                                  ;       None
 34803                                  ;
 34804                                  ;   HISTORY
 34805                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34806                                  ;
 34807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34808                                  
 34809                                  copy_block:
 34810                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34811                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34812                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34813                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34814                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34815                                  
 34816                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34817                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34818                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34819                                  
 34820                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34821                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34822                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34823                                  
 34824                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34825                                          push    di              ;
 34826                                  
 34827                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34828                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34829                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34830                                  
 34831                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34832                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34833                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34834                                  
 34835                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34836                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34837                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34838                                          pop     di              ;
 34839                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34840                                          push    cx              ;
 34841                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34842                                          push    si              ;
 34843                                          dec     dx              ;
 34844                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34845                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34846                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34847                                          pop     si              ;
 34848                                          pop     cx              ;
 34849                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34850                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34851                                  
 34852                                  copy_skip:
 34853                                          pop     di
 34854                                  copy_error:
 34855                                          clc                     ;
 34856                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34857                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34858                                  
 34859                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34860                                  
 34861                                  copy_line:
 34862                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34863                                          inc     di              ;
 34864                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34865                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34866                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34867                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34868                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34869                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34870                                          inc     di              ;
 34871                                          inc     di              ;
 34872                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 34873                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34874                                          call    get_char        ;
 34875                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34876                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34877                                          inc     di              ;
 34878                                  copy_next:
 34879                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34880                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34881                                  
 34882                                  copy_nextline:
 34883                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34884                                          jmp     short copy_block
 34885                                  
 34886                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34887                                  ;copy_done:
 34888                                          ;retn
 34889                                  
 34890                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34891                                  ;
 34892                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34893                                  ;
 34894                                  ;   INPUT
 34895                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34896                                  ;
 34897                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34898                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34899                                  ;
 34900                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34901                                  ;       DX
 34902                                  ;
 34903                                  ;   NOTES
 34904                                  ;       None
 34905                                  ;
 34906                                  ;   HISTORY
 34907                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34908                                  ;
 34909                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34910                                  
 34911                                  get_linenum:
 34912                                          push    ax              ;
 34913                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34914                                          push    cx              ;
 34915                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34916                                          push    si              ;
 34917                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34918                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34919                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34920                                          call    skip_line       ;
 34921                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 34922                                          inc     bx              ;
 34923                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34924                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34925                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34926                                          pop     si              ;
 34927                                          pop     cx              ;
 34928                                          pop     ax              ;
 34929                                          retn
 34930                                  
 34931                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34932                                  ;
 34933                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34934                                  ;
 34935                                  ;   INPUT
 34936                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34937                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34938                                  ;
 34939                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34940                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34941                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34942                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34943                                  ;
 34944                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34945                                  ;       None
 34946                                  ;
 34947                                  ;   NOTES
 34948                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34949                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34950                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34951                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34952                                  ;
 34953                                  ;   HISTORY
 34954                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34955                                  ;
 34956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34957                                  
 34958                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34959                                          push    ax              ;
 34960                                          push    cx              ;
 34961                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34962                                          push    si              ;
 34963                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34964                                          push    ds              ;
 34965                                          push    es              ;
 34966                                          pop     ds              ;
 34967                                          call    find_block      ;
 34968                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34969                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34970                                          pop     ds              ;
 34971                                          pop     si              ;
 34972                                          pop     cx              ;
 34973                                          pop     ax              ;
 34974                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34975                                          retn			;
 34976                                  
 34977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34978                                  ;
 34979                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34980                                  ;
 34981                                  ;   INPUT
 34982                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34983                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34984                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34985                                  ;
 34986                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34987                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34988                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34989                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34990                                  ;
 34991                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34992                                  ;       AX
 34993                                  ;
 34994                                  ;   NOTES
 34995                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34996                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34997                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34998                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34999                                  ;
 35000                                  ;   HISTORY
 35001                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35002                                  ;
 35003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35004                                  
 35005                                  find_block:
 35006                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35007                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35008                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35009                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35010                                          je	short check_line ; no
 35011                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35012                                          jne	short next_line	;
 35013                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35014                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 35015                                  check_line:
 35016                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35017                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35018                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35019                                  next_line:
 35020                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35021                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 35022                                  ;find_exit:
 35023                                  ;	retn
 35024                                  
 35025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35026                                  ;
 35027                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35028                                  ;
 35029                                  ;   INPUT
 35030                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35031                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35032                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35033                                  ;
 35034                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35035                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35036                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35037                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35038                                  ;
 35039                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35040                                  ;       AX
 35041                                  ;
 35042                                  ;   NOTES
 35043                                  ;       None
 35044                                  ;
 35045                                  ;   HISTORY
 35046                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35047                                  ;
 35048                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35049                                  
 35050                                  comp_names:
 35051                                          push    di              ;
 35052                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35053                                          call    get_char        ;
 35054                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 35055                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35056                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35057                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35058                                          inc     di              ;
 35059                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35060                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35061                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35062                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35063                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35064                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35065                                          pop     di              ;
 35066                                          retn			;
 35067                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35068                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35069                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35070                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35071                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35072                                  
 35073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35074                                  
 35075                                  comp_names_safe:
 35076                                          push    ax
 35077                                          push    cx
 35078                                          push	si
 35079                                          push    ds
 35080                                          push    cs
 35081                                          pop     ds
 35082                                          call    comp_names
 35083                                          pop     ds
 35084                                  	pop	si
 35085                                          pop     cx
 35086                                          pop     ax
 35087                                          retn
 35088                                  
 35089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35090                                  ;
 35091                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35092                                  ;
 35093                                  ;   INPUT
 35094                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35095                                  ;
 35096                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35097                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35098                                  ;
 35099                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35100                                  ;       None
 35101                                  ;
 35102                                  ;   NOTES
 35103                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35104                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35105                                  ;
 35106                                  ;   HISTORY
 35107                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35108                                  ;
 35109                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35110                                  
 35111                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35112                                          push    ax              ;
 35113                                          push    bx              ;
 35114                                          push    cx              ;
 35115                                          push    dx              ;
 35116                                          push    si              ;
 35117                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35118                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35119                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35120                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35121                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35122                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35123                                          add     dh,3            ;
 35124                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 35125                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35126                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35127                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35128                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35129                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35130                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35131                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35132                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 35133                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35134                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 35135                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35136                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35137                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35138                                  print_other:                    ;
 35139                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 35140                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35141                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35142                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35143                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35144                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35145                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35146                                          int     10h             ;
 35147                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35148                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35149                                          int     10h             ;
 35150                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35151                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35152                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35153                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35154                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35155                                          int     10h             ;
 35156                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35157                                          mov	ax,0920h
 35158                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35159                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35160                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35161                                          int     10h             ;
 35162                                          push    es              ;
 35163                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35164                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35165                                          inc     di              ;
 35166                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35167                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35168                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35169                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35170                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35171                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35172                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35173                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35174                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35175                                          int     10h             ;
 35176                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35177                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35178                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35179                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35180                                          int     10h             ;
 35181                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35182                                  print_done:                     ;
 35183                                          pop     es              ;
 35184                                          pop     dx              ;
 35185                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35186                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35187                                          pop     si              ;
 35188                                          pop     dx              ;
 35189                                          pop     cx              ;
 35190                                          pop     bx              ;
 35191                                          pop     ax              ;
 35192                                          retn			;
 35193                                  
 35194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35195                                  ;
 35196                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35197                                  ;
 35198                                  ;   INPUT
 35199                                  ;       None
 35200                                  ;
 35201                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35202                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35203                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35204                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35205                                  ;
 35206                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35207                                  ;       None
 35208                                  ;
 35209                                  ;   NOTES
 35210                                  ;       None
 35211                                  ;
 35212                                  ;   HISTORY
 35213                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35214                                  ;
 35215                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35216                                  
 35217                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35218                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35219                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35220                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35221                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35222                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35223                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35224                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35225                                          int     21h             ;
 35226                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35227                                  check_time:
 35228                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35229                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35230                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35231                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35232                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35233                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35234                                  show_time:
 35235                                          push    bx              ;
 35236                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35237                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35238                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35239                                          int     10h             ;
 35240                                          push    dx              ;
 35241                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35242                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35243                                          int     10h             ;
 35244                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35245                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35246                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35247                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35248                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35249                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35250                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35251                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35252                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35253                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35254                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35255                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35256                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35257                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35258                                          pop     dx
 35259                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35260                                          int     10h             ;
 35261                                          pop     bx              ;
 35262                                  input_key:
 35263                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35264                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35265                                          int     21h             ;
 35266                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35267                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35268                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35269                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35270                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35271                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35272                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35273                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35274                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35275                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35276                                  got_time:
 35277                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35278                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35279                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35280                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35281                                  got_key:
 35282                                          push    ax              ;
 35283                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35284                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35285                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35286                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35287                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35288                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35289                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35290                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35291                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35292                                          pop     bx   		;
 35293                                  
 35294                                  timeout_disabled:
 35295                                          pop     ax              ;
 35296                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35297                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35298                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35299                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35300                                  
 35301                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35302                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35303                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35304                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35305                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35306                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35307                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35308                                          jmp     short print1
 35309                                  not_up:
 35310                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35311                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35312                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35313                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35314                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35315                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35316                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35317                                  print1: 
 35318                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35319                                  print2: 
 35320                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35321                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35322                                  to_input_key:
 35323                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35324                                  not_down:
 35325                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35326                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35327                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35328                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35329                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35330                                          call    show_status     ;
 35331                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35332                                  not_f8:
 35333                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35334                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35335                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35336                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35337                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35338                                  
 35339                                  normal_key:
 35340                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35341                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35342                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35343                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35344                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35345                                          retn			;
 35346                                  not_backspace:
 35347                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35348                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35349                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35350                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35351                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35352                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35353                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35354                                          jmp	short print2
 35355                                  
 35356                                  select_done:
 35357                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35358                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35359                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35360                                  
 35361                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35362                                  
 35363                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35364                                  
 35365                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35366                                  ;
 35367                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ;   INPUT
 35370                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35371                                  ;
 35372                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35373                                  ;       None
 35374                                  ;
 35375                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35376                                  ;       None
 35377                                  ;
 35378                                  ;   NOTES
 35379                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35380                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35381                                  ;
 35382                                  ;   HISTORY
 35383                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35384                                  ;
 35385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35386                                  
 35387                                  disp_input:
 35388                                          push    ax
 35389                                          cmp     al,' '
 35390                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35391                                          mov     al,' '
 35392                                  disp_ok:
 35393                                          mov     dl,al
 35394                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35395                                          int     21h
 35396                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35397                                          call    print
 35398                                          pop     ax
 35399                                          retn
 35400                                  
 35401                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35402                                  
 35403                                  disp_num:
 35404                                          push    bx
 35405                                          add     al,'0'
 35406                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35407                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35408                                          mov     cx,1
 35409                                          int     10h
 35410                                          pop     bx
 35411                                          retn
 35412                                  
 35413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35414                                  ;
 35415                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35416                                  ;
 35417                                  ;   INPUT
 35418                                  ;       None
 35419                                  ;
 35420                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35421                                  ;       None
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35424                                  ;       None
 35425                                  ;
 35426                                  ;   NOTES
 35427                                  ;       None
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;   HISTORY
 35430                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35433                                  
 35434                                  show_status:
 35435                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35436                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35437                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35438                                          int     10h             ;
 35439                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35440                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35441                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35442                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35443                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35444                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35445                                          int     10h             ;
 35446                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35447                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35448                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35449                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35450                                  show_onoff: 
 35451                                          int     10h
 35452                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35453                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35454                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35455                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35456                                  
 35457                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35458                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35459                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35460                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35461                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35462                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35463                                          int     10h             ;
 35464                                  show_done:                      ;
 35465                                          pop     dx              ;
 35466                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35467                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35468                                          pop     bx              ;
 35469                                          retn			;
 35470                                  
 35471                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35472                                  
 35473                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35474                                  ;
 35475                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35476                                  ;
 35477                                  ;   INPUT
 35478                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35479                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35480                                  ;
 35481                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35482                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35483                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35484                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35485                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35486                                  ;
 35487                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35488                                  ;       AX
 35489                                  ;
 35490                                  ;   NOTES
 35491                                  ;       None
 35492                                  ;
 35493                                  ;   HISTORY
 35494                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35495                                  ;
 35496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35497                                  
 35498                                  skip_token:
 35499                                          call    get_char
 35500                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35501                                          call    any_delim
 35502                                          jne	short skip_token
 35503                                  skip_check_eol:
 35504                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35505                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35506                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35507                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35508                                          clc
 35509                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35510                                  	retn
 35511                                  skip_token_eol:
 35512                                          stc
 35513                                  skip_token_done:
 35514                                          retn
 35515                                  
 35516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35517                                  ;
 35518                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35519                                  ;
 35520                                  ;   INPUT
 35521                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35522                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35523                                  ;
 35524                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35525                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35526                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
