 35527                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35528                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35529                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35530                                  ;
 35531                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35532                                  ;       AX
 35533                                  ;
 35534                                  ;   NOTES
 35535                                  ;       None
 35536                                  ;
 35537                                  ;   HISTORY
 35538                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35539                                  ;
 35540                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35541                                  
 35542                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35543                                          call    get_char        ;
 35544                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35545                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35546                                          call    delim           ;
 35547                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35548                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35549                                  
 35550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35551                                  ;
 35552                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35553                                  ;
 35554                                  ;   INPUT
 35555                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35556                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35557                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35558                                  ;
 35559                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35560                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35561                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35562                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35563                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35564                                  ;
 35565                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35566                                  ;       AX
 35567                                  ;
 35568                                  ;   NOTES
 35569                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35570                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35571                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35572                                  ;
 35573                                  ;   HISTORY
 35574                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35575                                  ;
 35576                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35577                                  
 35578                                  skip_opt_line:
 35579                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35580                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35581                                       
 35582                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35583                                  
 35584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35585                                  ;
 35586                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35587                                  ;
 35588                                  ;   INPUT
 35589                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35590                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35591                                  ;
 35592                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35593                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35594                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35595                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35596                                  ;
 35597                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35598                                  ;       AX
 35599                                  ;
 35600                                  ;   NOTES
 35601                                  ;       None
 35602                                  ;
 35603                                  ;   HISTORY
 35604                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35605                                  ;
 35606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35607                                  
 35608                                  skip_line:
 35609                                          call    get_char
 35610                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35611                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35612                                          jne	short skip_line
 35613                                  skip_line_done:
 35614                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35615                                          retn
 35616                                  
 35617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35618                                  ;
 35619                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35620                                  ;
 35621                                  ;   INPUT
 35622                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35623                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35624                                  ;
 35625                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35626                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35627                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35628                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35629                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35630                                  ;
 35631                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35632                                  ;       AX
 35633                                  ;
 35634                                  ;   NOTES
 35635                                  ;       None
 35636                                  ;
 35637                                  ;   HISTORY
 35638                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35639                                  ;
 35640                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35641                                  
 35642                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35643                                  
 35644                                  get_number:
 35645                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35646                                  num_loop:
 35647                                          call    get_char        ;
 35648                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35649                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35650                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35651                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35652                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35653                                          push    ax              ;
 35654                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35655                                          push    dx              ;
 35656                                          mul     bx              ;
 35657                                          pop     dx              ;
 35658                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35659                                          pop     ax              ;
 35660                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35661                                          cbw                     ;
 35662                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35663                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35664                                  
 35665                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35666                                  ;num_done:
 35667                                          ;retn
 35668                                  
 35669                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35670                                  ;
 35671                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35672                                  ;
 35673                                  ;   INPUT
 35674                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35675                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35676                                  ;
 35677                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35678                                  ;       AL == next character
 35679                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35680                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35681                                  ;
 35682                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35683                                  ;       AX
 35684                                  ;
 35685                                  ;   NOTES
 35686                                  ;       None
 35687                                  ;
 35688                                  ;   HISTORY
 35689                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35690                                  ;
 35691                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35692                                  
 35693                                  get_char:
 35694                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35695                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35696                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35697                                  	es	
 35698                                  	lodsb
 35699                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35700                                          retn			;
 35701                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35702                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35703                                  nearby_ret:
 35704                                          retn
 35705                                  
 35706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35707                                  ;
 35708                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35709                                  ;
 35710                                  ;   INPUT
 35711                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35712                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35713                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35714                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35715                                  ;
 35716                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35717                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35718                                  ;
 35719                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35720                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35721                                  ;
 35722                                  ;   NOTES
 35723                                  ;       None
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ;   HISTORY
 35726                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35727                                  ;
 35728                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35729                                  
 35730                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35731                                  query_user:
 35732                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35733                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35734                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35735                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35736                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35737                                  qu_1:
 35738                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35739                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35740                                          push    ax                      ;
 35741                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35742                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35743                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35744                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35745                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35746                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35747                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35748                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35749                                  query_all:
 35750                                  
 35751                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35752                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35753                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35754                                  
 35755                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35756                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35757                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35758                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35759                                  
 35760                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35761                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35762                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35763                                  find_match:                             ;
 35764                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35765                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35766                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35767                                          inc     di                      ;
 35768                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35769                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35770                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35771                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35772                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35773                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35774                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35775                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35776                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35777                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35778                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35779                                          inc     di                      ;
 35780                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35781                                          int     21h                     ;
 35782                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35783                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35784                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35785                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35786                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35787                                  cmd_notset:
 35788                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35789                                  line_print:                             ;
 35790                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35791                                          es
 35792                                  	lodsb
 35793                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35794                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35795                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35796                                  non_null:                               ;
 35797                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35798                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35799                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35800                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35801                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35802                                  non_space:                              ;
 35803                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35804                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35805                                          int     21h                     ;
 35806                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35807                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35808                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35809                                  
 35810                                  generic_prompt:
 35811                                          call    print                   ;
 35812                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35813                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35814                                          int     16h                     ;
 35815                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35816                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35817                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35818                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35819                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35820                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35821                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35822                                  not_func:
 35823                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35824                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35825                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35826                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35827                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35828                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35829                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35830                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35831                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35832                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35833                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35834                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35835                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35836                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35837                                  
 35838                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35839                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35840                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35841                                  	clc
 35842                                  do_cmd:
 35843                                  	pop     ax			;
 35844                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35845                                  	; cf=0
 35846                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35847                                  	retn
 35848                                  
 35849                                  skip_cmd:
 35850                                  	pop     ax			;
 35851                                  skip_all:
 35852                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35853                                  	stc
 35854                                  	retn
 35855                                  
 35856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35857                                  ;
 35858                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35859                                  ;
 35860                                  ;   INPUT
 35861                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35862                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35863                                  ;
 35864                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35865                                  ;       None
 35866                                  ;
 35867                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35868                                  ;       None
 35869                                  ;
 35870                                  ;   NOTES
 35871                                  ;       None
 35872                                  ;
 35873                                  ;   HISTORY
 35874                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35875                                  ;
 35876                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35877                                  
 35878                                  print_error:
 35879                                          push    ax
 35880                                          push    bx
 35881                                          push    cx
 35882                                          push    dx
 35883                                          push    ds
 35884                                          push    cs
 35885                                          pop     ds
 35886                                          pushf
 35887                                          call    get_linenum
 35888                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35889                                          call    error_line
 35890                                          popf
 35891                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35892                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35893                                          call    print
 35894                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35895                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35896                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35897                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35898                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35899                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35900                                  pe_1:     
 35901                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35902                                          call    print
 35903                                  pe_ret: 
 35904                                  	pop     ds
 35905                                          pop     dx
 35906                                          pop     cx
 35907                                          pop     bx
 35908                                          pop     ax
 35909                                  	retn
 35910                                  
 35911                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35912                                  
 35913                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35914                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35915                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35916                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35917                                  
 35918                                  disable_autoexec:
 35919                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35920                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35921                                  
 35922                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35923                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35924                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35925                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35926                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35927                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35928                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35929                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35930                                  dae_1:
 35931                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35932                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35933                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35934                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35935                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35936                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35937                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35938                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35939                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35940                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35941                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35942                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35943                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35944                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35945                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35946                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35947                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35948                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35949                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35950                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35951                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35952                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35953                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35954                                          retn
 35955                                  
 35956                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35957                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35958                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35959                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35960                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35961                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35962                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35963                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35964                                  
 35965                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35966                                  
 35967                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35968                                  
 35969                                  
 35970                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35971

 35973                                  ;
 35974                                  ; procedure : delim
 35975                                  ;
 35976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35977                                  
 35978                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35979                                  ;
 35980                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35981                                  ;
 35982                                  ;any_delim:
 35983                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35984                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35985                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35986                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35987                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35988                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35989                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35990                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35991                                  ;
 35992                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35993                                  
 35994                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35995                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35996                                  delim:
 35997 0000306F 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35998 00003071 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35999                                  
 36000 00003073 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36001 00003075 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 36002                                  
 36003                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36004 00003077 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36005 00003079 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 36006 0000307B 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36007 0000307D 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 36008 0000307F 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36009 00003081 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 36010 00003083 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36011 00003085 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 36012 00003087 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36013                                  
 36014                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36015                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36016                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36017                                  ;	clc
 36018                                  ;;endif
 36019                                  
 36020                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36021                                  delim_ret:
 36022 00003089 C3                      	retn
 36023

 36043                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36044                                  ;
 36045                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36046                                  
 36047                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36048                                  mapcase:
 36049 00003097 51                      	push	cx
 36050 00003098 56                      	push	si
 36051 00003099 1E                      	push	ds
 36052                                  
 36053 0000309A 06                      	push	es
 36054 0000309B 1F                      	pop	ds
 36055                                  
 36056                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36057                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36058                                  ;
 36059                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36060                                  ;;else
 36061                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36062                                  ;;endif
 36063                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36064 0000309C 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36065                                  
 36066                                  convloop:
 36067 0000309E AC                      	lodsb
 36068 0000309F 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36069 000030A1 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36070 000030A3 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36071 000030A5 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36072 000030A7 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36073 000030A9 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36074                                  noconv:
 36075                                  
 36076                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36077                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36078                                  ;;
 36079                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36080                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36081                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36082                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36083                                  ;;
 36084                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36085                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36086                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36087                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36088                                  ;check_eol:
 36089                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36090                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36091                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36092                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36093                                  ;;endif
 36094                                  	
 36095                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36096 000030AC E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36097                                  convdone:
 36098 000030AE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36099 000030AF 5E                      	pop	si
 36100 000030B0 59                      	pop	cx
 36101 000030B1 C3                      	retn

 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ; procedure : round
 36106                                  ;
 36107                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36108                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36109                                  ;
 36110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36111                                  
 36112                                  round:
 36113 000030B2 50                      	push	ax
 36114 000030B3 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36115                                  
 36116 000030B7 E8F5DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36117                                  
 36118 000030BA 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36119 000030BF 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36120 000030C6 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36121 000030CA 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36122 000030CF 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 36123 000030D1 2EF606[2414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36124 000030D7 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36125 000030D9 06                      	push	es
 36126 000030DA 56                      	push	si
 36127 000030DB 2E8B36[2214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36128 000030E0 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36129 000030E2 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36130 000030E4 48                      	dec	ax
 36131                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36132 000030E5 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36133 000030E9 2E8026[2414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36134 000030EF 5E                      	pop	si
 36135 000030F0 07                      	pop	es
 36136                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36137 000030F1 58                      	pop	ax
 36138                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36139                                  	; cf = 0
 36140                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36141                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36142 000030F2 C3                      	retn

 36200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36201                                  ;
 36202                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36203                                  ;
 36204                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36205                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36206                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36207                                  ;
 36208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36209                                  
 36210                                  getnum:
 36211 00003129 53                      	push	bx
 36212 0000312A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36213                                  b2:
 36214 0000312C E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36215 0000312F 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36216                                  
 36217 00003131 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36218 00003132 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36219                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36220                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36221 00003133 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36222 00003135 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36223 00003137 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36224 00003138 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36225 0000313A 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36226 0000313D 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36227                                  
 36228 0000313F 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36229                                  
 36230 00003140 E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36231 00003143 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36232 00003145 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36233 00003147 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36234 00003149 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36235 0000314B 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36236 0000314D 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36237 0000314F 7417                    	je	short b15
 36238 00003151 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36239 00003156 7410                    	je	short b15
 36240 00003158 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36241                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36242                                  	;nop
 36243                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36244                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36245                                  	;nop
 36246                                  	;nop
 36247 0000315A 740C                    	je	short b15
 36248 0000315C 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36249 0000315E 7408                    	je	short b15
 36250 00003160 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36251 00003162 7404                    	je	short b15
 36252 00003164 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36253 00003166 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36254                                  b15:
 36255 00003168 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36256 0000316D 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36257                                  b1:
 36258 00003172 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36259 00003174 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36260 00003176 5B                      	pop	bx
 36261 00003177 C3                      	retn
 36262                                  badnum:
 36263                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36264                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36265 00003178 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36266                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36267 0000317A 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36268 0000317E 5B                      	pop	bx
 36269 0000317F F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36270 00003180 C3                      	retn
 36271                                  
 36272                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36273                                  
 36274                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36275                                  
 36276                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36277                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36278                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36279                                  ;	si = 0
 36280                                  ;	ax = country id
 36281                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36282                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36283                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36284                                  ;
 36285                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36286                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36287                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36288                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36289                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36290                                  
 36291 00003181 57                      	push	di
 36292 00003182 50                      	push	ax
 36293 00003183 52                      	push	dx
 36294                                  
 36295 00003184 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36296 00003186 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36297 00003188 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36298 0000318B E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36299 0000318E 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36300                                  
 36301 00003190 06                      	push	es
 36302 00003191 56                      	push	si
 36303                                  
 36304 00003192 0E                      	push	cs
 36305 00003193 07                      	pop	es
 36306                                  
 36307 00003194 BF[B534]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36308 00003197 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36309 0000319A F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36310                                  
 36311 0000319C 5E                      	pop	si
 36312 0000319D 07                      	pop	es
 36313 0000319E 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36314                                  
 36315 000031A0 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36316 000031A3 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36317 000031A6 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36318                                  
 36319 000031A8 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36320 000031A9 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36321 000031AB 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36322 000031AE B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36323 000031B1 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36324 000031B4 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36325                                  
 36326 000031B6 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36327 000031B8 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36328 000031BC 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36329                                  
 36330 000031BE 46                      	inc	si
 36331 000031BF 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36332 000031C0 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36333 000031C1 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36334 000031C2 5F                      	pop	di
 36335                                  
 36336                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36337 000031C3 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36338 000031C6 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36339                                  
 36340 000031C8 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36341 000031CB 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36342 000031CD 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36343 000031D0 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36344                                  
 36345                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36346 000031D2 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36347 000031D4 46                      	inc	si
 36348 000031D5 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36349 000031D6 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36350                                  
 36351 000031D8 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36352                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36353 000031DB F9                      	stc
 36354 000031DC C3                      	retn
 36355                                  
 36356                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36357 000031DD 5E                      	pop	si
 36358 000031DE 59                      	pop	cx
 36359 000031DF 5F                      	pop	di
 36360 000031E0 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36361                                  
 36362                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36363 000031E2 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36364                                  
 36365                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36366 000031E5 2E8916[BD34]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36367 000031EA 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36368 000031ED 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36369 000031F0 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36370 000031F3 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36371 000031F6 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36372                                  
 36373 000031F8 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36374 000031FA 46                      	inc	si

 36376

 36383 00003202 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di

 36391 00003213 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36392

 36394 00003218 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36395 0000321B B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36396 0000321D F9                      	stc
 36397 0000321E CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36398 00003220 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36399                                  
 36400 00003222 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36401 00003224 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36402

 36404 00003229 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36405 0000322C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36406 0000322F F9                      	stc

 36408 00003232 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36409

 36413 0000323A 5E                      	pop	si

 36415 0000323E 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36416 00003241 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36417 00003243 F9                      	stc

 36419 00003246 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36420                                  
 36421 00003248 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36422 0000324A 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail

 36425 0000324F BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field

 36427 00003254 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36428 00003255 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36429 00003256 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36430 0000325A 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 36437 00003261 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry

 36440                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36441 00003267 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]

 36443

 36459 00003280 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]

 36466 00003287 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36467 00003289 46                      	inc	si
 36468 0000328A 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36469 0000328B 49                      	dec	cx
 36470 0000328C 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36471 0000328F 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36472 00003291 E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data

 36485 00003298 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36486 0000329C 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so

 36505                                  
 36506                                  getcountrydestination:
 36507                                  
 36508                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36509                                  ;input: al - data id
 36510                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36511                                  ;on return:
 36512                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36513                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36514                                  
 36515 000032AF 51                      	push	cx
 36516                                  	;add	di,74
 36517 000032B0 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36518                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36519 000032B3 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36520 000032B6 47                      	inc	di
 36521 000032B7 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36522                                  
 36523                                  getcntrydest:

 36531                                  
 36532                                  getcntrydest_1:

 36534 000032C8 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36535                                  getcntrydest_loop:

 36539

 36555                                  
 36556                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36557                                  
 36558                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36559                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36560                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36561                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36562                                  ;	 be moved.
 36563                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36564                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36565                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36566                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36567                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36568                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36569                                  
 36570 000032DD 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36571 000032DE B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36572 000032E1 F9                      	stc
 36573 000032E2 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36574 000032E4 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36575 000032E5 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36576                                  
 36577 000032E7 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36578 000032E9 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36579 000032EB B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36580 000032ED F9                      	stc
 36581 000032EE CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36582                                  ricb_exit:
 36583 000032F0 C3                      	retn

 36587                                  set_country_path:
 36588                                  
 36589                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36590                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36591                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36592                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36593                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36594                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36595                                  
 36596 000032F1 56                      	push	si
 36597                                  
 36598 000032F2 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36599 000032F3 06                      	push	es
 36600 000032F4 1F                      	pop	ds
 36601 000032F5 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 36602                                  
 36603 000032F6 E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 36604 000032F9 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 36605

 36608 000032FE 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 36609 000032FF EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv

 36611                                  scp_default_drv:
 36612 00003301 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36613 00003303 CD21                    	int	21h
 36614 00003305 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36615                                  
 36616                                  scp_setdrv:
 36617 00003307 2EA2[7234]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36618 0000330B BF[7534]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36619 0000330E 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36620 00003310 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36621 00003312 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36622                                  
 36623 00003314 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36624 00003316 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36625                                  
 36626 00003318 EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36627

 36630                                  scp_path:

 36632                                  
 36633 0000331E BF[7234]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36634                                  scpath_exit:

 36638 00003323 1F                      	pop	ds
 36639 00003324 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36640                                  
 36641 00003325 5E                      	pop	si
 36642 00003326 C3                      	retn

 36647                                  
 36648                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36649                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36650                                  ;carry set if not.

 36653 00003328 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"

 36659 00003336 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
